content.rendered:
We’ve been all over the airwaves recently so why not fill your ears with the dulcet tones of founder Pat Stephenson as he talks about great client relationships and starting an agency in the last recession on The Entrepreneur Experiment with Gary Fox?

Or you could sit back and tune into this online seminar, Branding – Vital for Ireland’s Economic Recovery, hosted by The Institute of Directors in Ireland and IAPI. Our  CCO Rory Hamilton joined David McRedmond (CEO, An Post), Elaine Carey (Chief Commercial Officer, Three UK & Ireland) and Paul Kelly (CEO, Fáilte Ireland) on stage for a fascinating event examining the importance of creativity and branding for Irish businesses.
